00003 #ifndef COLLAGE_VERSION_H
00004 #define COLLAGE_VERSION_H
00005 
00006 #include <co/api.h>
00007 #include <string>
00008 
00009 namespace co
00010 {
00012 #   define CO_VERSION_MAJOR 1
00013 
00015 #   define CO_VERSION_MINOR 1
00016 
00018 #   define CO_VERSION_PATCH 0
00019 
00021 #   define CO_VERSION_REVISION 0x378ab5c
00022 
00024 #   define CO_VERSION_ABI 110
00025 
00027 #   define CO_VERSION_GT( MAJOR, MINOR, PATCH )       \
00028     ( (CO_VERSION_MAJOR>MAJOR) ||                     \
00029       (CO_VERSION_MAJOR==MAJOR && (CO_VERSION_MINOR>MINOR || \
00030           (CO_VERSION_MINOR==MINOR && CO_VERSION_PATCH>PATCH))))
00031 
00033 #   define CO_VERSION_GE( MAJOR, MINOR, PATCH )       \
00034     ( (CO_VERSION_MAJOR>MAJOR) ||                     \
00035       (CO_VERSION_MAJOR==MAJOR && (CO_VERSION_MINOR>MINOR || \
00036           (CO_VERSION_MINOR==MINOR && CO_VERSION_PATCH>=PATCH))))
00037 
00039 #   define CO_VERSION_LT( MAJOR, MINOR, PATCH )       \
00040     ( (CO_VERSION_MAJOR<MAJOR) ||                     \
00041       (CO_VERSION_MAJOR==MAJOR && (CO_VERSION_MINOR<MINOR || \
00042           (CO_VERSION_MINOR==MINOR && CO_VERSION_PATCH<PATCH))))
00043 
00045 #   define CO_VERSION_LE( MAJOR, MINOR, PATCH )       \
00046     ( (CO_VERSION_MAJOR<MAJOR) ||                     \
00047       (CO_VERSION_MAJOR==MAJOR && (CO_VERSION_MINOR<MINOR || \
00048         (CO_VERSION_MINOR==MINOR && CO_VERSION_PATCH<=PATCH))))
00049 
00051 class CO_API Version
00052 {
00053 public:
00055     static int getMajor();
00056 
00058     static int getMinor();
00059 
00061     static int getPatch();
00062 
00064     static std::string getString();
00065 
00067     static int getRevision();
00068 
00070     static int getABI();
00071 
00073     static std::string getRevString();
00074 
00083     static bool check()
00084     {
00085         return getMajor()==CO_VERSION_MAJOR &&
00086                getMinor()==CO_VERSION_MINOR;
00087     }
00088 };
00089 
00090 }
00091 
00092 #endif
